subject: Re: [junit] Need to get the Error, Failure and the CallStack after 	each testcase run
msgSnippet: Can you use JUnit 4 (org.junit.*)?  This would be dead easy with a TestWatchman. David Saff On Fri, Mar 26, 2010 at 1:43 AM, gajendranchandrappa
messageBody:
Can you use JUnit 4 (org.junit.*)? This would be dead easy with a TestWatchman.

David Saff

On Fri, Mar 26, 2010 at 1:43 AM, gajendranchandrappa
<gajendran.chandrappa@...> wrote:
> Is there a way to do the above Thru any of the junit.framework.* methods as a value that can be stored into the database after the individual Test run.
>
> I need to collect these values inside the tearDown() method after each individual test run.
>
>
